تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Dee, Hagop

 

It was great to meet you both yesterday. In continuation to our discussion, please find attached the presentation that was made. We would require the following to provide you with a cyber solution:

 

*	Attached proposal form and ransomware questionnaire
*	IT Governance Chart
*	Report of the ‘pre-risk’ activities
*	Since you are already working with Intertec, they could generate a ‘Value at Risk’ report for the group

 

As requested by Dee, I have also attached the link pertaining to the regional data that was presented yesterday.

 

Let us know in case of any clarifications on the same. 

 

Thanks and regards,

 

Ashok Peter Eapen Dip CII, FRM

Regional Director, General Insurance (Financial Lines & Engineering)
